languages.text: "Нет покоя грешным душам. Император все видит!"
"Wicked souls deserve no rest. The Emperor sees all!"
languages.original_text: "Нет покоя грешным душам. Император все видит!"

traits.locale_text: "There is no rest for the wicked. The Emperor sees all!"
"There is no rest for the wicked. The Emperor sees all!"
"There is no rest for the wicked. The Emperor sees all!"
"Wicked souls deserve no rest. The Emperor sees all!"
"Wicked souls deserve no rest. The Emperor sees all!"

languages.text: "Böse Seelen verdienen keine Ruhe. Der Imperator sieht alles!"
languages.original_text: "Wicked souls deserve no rest. The Emperor sees all!"

traits.locale_text: "Böse Seelen verdienen keine Ruhe. Der Imperator sieht alles!"

languages.text: « Les âmes impures ne méritent aucun répit. L'Empereur voit tout ! »
languages.original_text: "Wicked souls deserve no rest. The Emperor sees all!"

traits.locale_text: « Les âmes impures ne méritent aucun répit. L'Empereur voit tout ! »

languages.text: “恶人不得善终！帝皇无所不知！”
languages.original_text: "Wicked souls deserve no rest. The Emperor sees all!"

traits.locale_text: “恶人不得善终！帝皇无所不知！”

languages.text: «Los malvados no merecen descanso. ¡El Emperador lo ve todo!».
languages.original_text: "Wicked souls deserve no rest. The Emperor sees all!"

traits.locale_text: «Los malvados no merecen descanso. ¡El Emperador lo ve todo!».

languages.text: 「悪しき魂に安息はない。皇帝はすべてを見通している！」
languages.original_text: "Wicked souls deserve no rest. The Emperor sees all!"

traits.locale_text: 「悪しき魂に安息はない。皇帝はすべてを見通している！」

languages.text: "Günahkârlara huzur yoktur. İmparator her şeyi görür!"
languages.original_text: "Wicked souls deserve no rest. The Emperor sees all!"

traits.locale_text: "Günahkârlara huzur yoktur. İmparator her şeyi görür!"
